product_name: Bed HeadHair Wax Stick For Strong Hold
summary: SummaryThe original and iconic Bed Head Wax Stick! This hair wax stick gives hairstyles instant texture, definition and separation. The hair wax has a strong hold, and is super easy to apply and style hair with. The wax complex leaves hairstyles smooth and frizz-free.
details: DetailsBenefitsHair wax stick with a strong holdGives hairstyles texture, definition and separationEasy application straight onto the hairLeaves hair smooth and frizz freeBed Head by Tigi Wax Stick is great for styling short to medium hairKey IngredientsFormulated with Beeswax and Japan Wax to give hair hold and definition while creating texture and giving control, and Castor Oil to condition the hair and leave hair feeling smooth and frizz-free!Item 6026448How To UseGreat for styling short to medium hair lengths! Apply to dry or damp hair. For short hair (2-3 inches in length), apply in a circular motion over entire head, then style with fingers. For mid to long hair lengths, flick hair wax through mid-lengths to ends. Top tip: Use a hairdryer to gently heat up the wax before applying for a smoother application. You don't have to apply it straight to your head either - apply the wax stick to the hands first and use fingers to create the final details.Precaution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse with water.IngredientsRicinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Beeswax (Cera Alba/Cire d'Abeille), Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Hydrogenated Fish Oil, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax (Candelilla Cera/ Cire de candelilla), Sorbitan Stearate, Hydrogenated Coconut Oil, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax (Cera Carnauba/ Cire de carnauba), Fragrance (Parfum), Paraffin, Stearic Acid, BHT, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Coumarin, Eugenol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.
how_to_use: Great for styling short to medium hair lengths! Apply to dry or damp hair. For short hair (2-3 inches in length), apply in a circular motion over entire head, then style with fingers. For mid to long hair lengths, flick hair wax through mid-lengths to ends. Top tip: Use a hairdryer to gently heat up the wax before applying for a smoother application. You don't have to apply it straight to your head either - apply the wax stick to the hands first and use fingers to create the final details.Precaution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse with water.
ingredients: Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax (Candelilla Cera/ Cire de candelilla)
Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax (Cera Carnauba/ Cire de carnauba)

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Promised to control flyaways and it does.  Not oily or sticky looking.

reviews.headline: I would by again
reviews.comments: I love this hair product but it left my hair sticky after multiple washes but it also held my hair back really well and it held up for cheer and stunning

reviews.headline: Repurchased twice. But there are cheaper alternatives
reviews.comments: Honestly, found this product through TikTok. Rep purchased it twice. Loved it at the beginning. However, now I'd see that it's not very long lasting. I put it on in the morning and then by the time I get off of work, go to the gym it still sticks, but i guess a more accurate word would be it clumps my baby hairs together so they are still sticking up but just now in clumps. Also washing it off doesn't happen over night you need to wash your hairs, at least two days consecutively without using the product. Smells fresh though.

reviews.comments: Love this product love

reviews.comments: I don't reccomend this product at all, it made my hair so greasy and stiff. And to make it worse the price is soooo not worth it

reviews.headline: Good but not worth the price
reviews.comments: Works really well and it washes off, but there are lots of other products that achieve the same result.

reviews.headline: Holds down my flyaways. Luv it!
reviews.comments: Luuuuuv this product! A lil spendy but oh well

reviews.headline: I wouldn't but it again
reviews.comments: I think this product is good but for the price it is not worth it at all. I am 19 and a couple of weeks ago I bought this product at Ulta and the price was like 100 or something before I bought it but then after she rang it up is was like 130 and the product is that great so all in all if your on a budget DO NOT buy this.

reviews.headline: Greasy
reviews.comments: It was just so greasy did not work out for me

reviews.headline: Greasy
reviews.comments: It was just so greasy did not work out for me

reviews.headline: Recommended !
reviews.comments: Definitely going to continue purchasing this product ! you teach yourself each time you apply this product

reviews.headline: First time purchase
reviews.comments: Wanted a product that would tame the loose hairs by my ears that look like a clown...  This works perfectly for those areas and other areas as well. Definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: Buyer Beware!!
reviews.comments: The packaging could use a serious change. My cap wa stuck on pretty tight when inforst bought the product at Ulta- so i struggled to open it for a while not realizing i was cutting the crap out of the palms of my hands and fingers with the sharp raw edges on the lid. There was blo*d everywhere. Please be careful!! I would attach a pic but cant figure out how to! The product itself is a heavy wax and im not sure if i like it yet. It has a hard time sticking my hair down all the way for long.

reviews.headline: not for me
reviews.comments: it smells terrible. it's greasy and I was surprised with the price being so much.

reviews.headline: I wish this would work on thick hair
reviews.comments: I have long straight thick hair and I'm aware that this product is for short to medium hair. I just needed something to stick my baby hairs in place when I put my hair up. This product is ok. It feels like waxing on my head but does the job to hold my hair up for an hour or two until I have to reapply it again. I'm assuming it's because my hair is thick and heavy so it doesn't stick as well. I used this during a concert and it isn't sweatproof nor does it last for the whole day. I would probably use this for the days when I'm not out the entire time.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: This Bed Head wax stick works well and is easy to use. It controlled my fly aways and keeps my hairstyle in place. It left no white residue and I am a brunette.  I am so happy with this product.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments:
Helps lay down wig.
Apply lightly to avoid oily or sticky hair 
I've not tried it on my thick hair yet

reviews.headline: SLICK FOR DAYS
reviews.comments: Easy to apply, does leave a residue. Just use detox shampoo with it. üîù

reviews.headline: Impossible to wash out
reviews.comments: I used this once for a slicked back pony & it kind of hurt to apply (pulled on my roots as i slicked my hair back). Once applied, it was very sticky (the stickiness didnt go away) with a strong eucalyptus smell that also didnt go away. When i tried to wash it out, the only thing that worked was soaking my roots in hair oil and then washing my hair with dish soap a couple times. I will definitely never use this again!

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Creates as much pieciness & volume as you want.
Rub a dab in palms,then hand style hair.

display_values: Creates as much pieciness & volume as you want.
Rub a dab in palms,then hand style hair.

faceoff_positive.comments: i have a short haircut that looks best with lots of piecey-ness and definition.  this is the ONLY product that gives me the definition, shine, and hold WITHOUT a crunchy hard finish.  my husband can run his fingers through my hair and it is soft and flexible.  love, love, love this stuff. i scrape a bit off with my thumbnail, place it in my palm, warm it with the blow dryer, then rub my hands together to emulsify it til it's clear....then rub it all over my hair...in all directions.  then i do it one more time, and shape the hair the way i want it.
faceoff_positive.headline: holy grail...

faceoff_negative.comments:
loved the cool container but you have to push the product up from the bottom to use it and you have to figure that out yourself. The instructions actually suggest rubbing the stick in circles directly on short hair...huge mistake since this applies way too much product to a pixie. I rubbed my fingers over the stick and "pinched" it onto the ends then ran my fingers trough to style. This stuff does not wash off your hands well (still had waxy residue after 3 washes). My style looked good at first...piecey texture that was not stiff or greasy. By the end of the day my hair was flat and felt dirty/greasy. I could restyle but it quickly fell flat.

Basically, this product is like the others I have tried but with a higher price tag. Still in search of a texturing product for my fine, straight hair that wont turn it into a greasy mess or leave my hair plastered by my head. I can see the advantages of this product for other hair types but not fine short hair.
faceoff_negative.headline: started out ok but...
